page.title: 16Our Teacher's Day at Hassell
page.content: At 7.00 Mrs. Cherry's alarm rings, she pretends not to hear it but at 7.10 she rises and wakes the children. After washing she gets breakfast(cereals and toast). Afterwards she washes up and then puts the washing machine going. 7.55 Remembers to feed the budgie. 8.00 Leaves home for school and arrives at 8.20 and prepares for the day. 8.55 school begins and she teaches us Maths, English and many other subjects. She has a break at 10.40 for 15 minutes but she's on playground duty. At 12.00 she has lunch and marks our Maths or has a Netball Practice.At 13.15 the afternoon session begins.It finishes at 15.45. After clearing up in school she goes shopping and then home to get tea for the family. At about 18.00 she does household jobs before marking our work and preparing for the next day. If lucky she goes to bed at 23.45.
